item.title: Sleepwell Youth Hostel
item.body: 240 beds. The hostel stands right in the centre of Brussels (shopping streets and metro nearby). Anyone who has tried to find more reasonably priced accommodation has probably slept under the stars! Rooms of every category, from 1 to 6 beds, with or without en-suite bathroom, for students, families and backpackers.Special terms for groups. A number of relaxation areas, TV room, bar, terrace, barbecue, meeting rooms, etc. Bicycle hire and guided tours. No member’s card; open around the clock. On-line bookings on the site

item.title: Gîte-auberge J.Brel
item.body:
If you want to stay in Brussels in a friendly and international atmosphere, then why not book a stay in the Jacques Brel Youth Hostel? Its location in the heart of the city makes it the ideal starting point for discovering Brussels. There is a terrace and bar where you can enjoy Belgian beers and snack meals. Free wi-fi !

 
Youth Hostel member of Hostelling International
 

Booking online :
www.hihostels.com et www.lesaubergesdejeunesse.be

item.title: Auberge Génération Europe
item.body:
What better than the multicultural atmosphere of the capital of Europe? ...And the best place to enjoy this atmosphere is right in the centre of Brussels! So don’t think twice – the Génération Europe Youth Hostel is the place for you! You will be just 15 minutes’ walk from the Grand-Place and a whole host of activities! Plus, there’s no need to worry about parking: we have room for your bike, your car or even for coaches!

Youth Hostel member of Hostelling International

Online Reservation:
www.hihostels.com et www.lesaubergesdejeunesse.be

item.title: Centre Van Gogh
item.body: Comfortable centre, 15 minutes’ walk from the Grand’ Place with friendly staff and a relaxed atmosphere. Easy access by underground, tram & bus. Close to Gare du Nord. 210 beds in individual and group rooms. Breakfast included. Bar/restaurant, television, video, billiards, veranda, gardens. Free cooking facilities, washing machines and tumbledriers, free luggage store, internet access, special group facilities, coach park. Booking by e-mail and 24 hour access by magnetic cards..

item.title: Jeugdherberg Bruegel
item.body: In Brussels’ antiques area, 5 minutes from the Grand’ Place. Easy access with metro, tram or bus. Only 300 metres away from the Gare Centrale. 134 beds. Individual, double or group rooms. Equipped meeting and recreation rooms. Inner courtyard. Television and video. Bar, restaurant. Luggage room for groups and lockers for individuals. Lift. Monitored car park for bikes and motorbikes. Laundrette 50m away. Booking by e-mail. Accessible for those with reduced mobility. 24 hour acces

item.title: Auberge des 3 Fontaines
item.body:
L’Auberge des 3 Fontaines est le plan idéal pour découvrir la capitale de l’Europe - Grand' Place, shopping, restos, fresques BD, spectacles, ... - mais aussi pour vous détendre en pleine nature.
Votre escapade en ville vous a super fatigués? Pas de souci, la forêt, les terrains de tennis, les étangs vous attendent pour la détente.
Vous voulez encore plus vous éclater? Les snacks, brasseries, discothèques des environs sont là pour animer vos nuits.
